entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. Low minus 13 except minus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
